entries.text: Аркхэм пал жертвой ужасной мести Умордхота.
сыщики принесли Литу Чентлер в жертву Умордхоту.
во время карнавала многие были принесены в жертву Книдаткуа.
the Excelsior is quiet, for now.
the investigators fled the scene of the crime.
ругару продолжает наводить ужас на болота.
ругару убит, а его проклятие снято.
ругapy свободен, а проклятие перешло на вас.
you are aware of Xzharah’s plans.
the curse of slumber was lifted.
the Day of Reckoning is coming.
сыщики изгнали Сайласа Бишопа из нашего мира.
у банды О’Бэнниона есть счёты с сыщиками.
Доктор Фрэнсис Морган пережил наследие Данвича.
Доктор Генри Армитедж пережил наследие Данвича.
на пути в Данвич сыщики были задержаны.
сыщики избавили Сайласа Бишопа от мук.
сыщики провели несколько часов без сознания.
Профессор Уоррен Райс пережил наследие Данвича.
Йог-Сотот прорвал барьер между мирами и слился с реальностью.
Йог-Сотот прорвал барьер между мирами и слился с реальностью.
во время карнавала многие были принесены в жертву Книдаткуа.

the Day of Reckoning is coming.
the investigators were attacked as they escaped the Asylum.
the realm of Carcosa merged with our own, and Hastur rules over them both.
вы решили не обращаться в полицию.
you did not escape the gaze of the phantom.
you entered the catacombs on your own.
the followers of the sign have found the way forward.
Hastur has you in his grasp.
you intruded on a secret meeting.
you know the site of the gate.
you left the onyx clasp behind.
the investigators prevented Hastur from escaping his prison.
#name# read Act 2 of The King in Yellow.
you slayed the monsters at the dinner party.
you were unable to find Nigel.

supplies.name: Sticky Goop
supplies.description: A mysterious scepter you found in a subterranean swamp.

supplies.name: Mysterious Scepter
supplies.description: A mysterious scepter you found in the throne room.

supplies.name: Key of Eztli
supplies.description: The Key of Eztli.

supplies.name: Провизия
supplies.description: Пища и вода для одного человека. Необходима в любом путешествии.

supplies.name: Бензин
supplies.description: Хватит для долгой поездки на машине.

supplies.name: Аптечка
supplies.description: Средства против болезни, заражения и яда.

supplies.name: Медальон
supplies.description: Бесполезен, но пробуждает приятные воспоминания вдали от дома.

supplies.name: Pocketknife
supplies.description: Маловат для полноценного оружия, зато легко спрятать.

supplies.name: Фляга
supplies.description: Можно набрать воды в реках и ручьях.

supplies.name: Мел
supplies.description: Оставляет метки на камне.

supplies.name: Одеяло
supplies.description: Согревает ночами.

supplies.name: Компас
supplies.description: Укажет путь, если вы безнадёжно заблудитесь.

supplies.name: Бинокль
supplies.description: Чтобы видеть на большом расстоянии.

supplies.name: Кирка
supplies.description: Чтобы раскалывать камни.

supplies.name: Верёвка
supplies.description: Несколько мотков крепкой верёвки для скалолазания и спелеологии.

supplies.name: Карта
supplies.description: Пока чистая, но при случае вы сможете нанести на неё окружающую местность.

supplies.name: Факелы
supplies.description: Разгоняют темноту и зажигают светильники.

entries.text: #name# was pulled into the spectral realm.
the investigators are on Gavriella’s trail.
the investigators are on Jerome’s trail.
the investigators are on Valentino's trail.
the investigators are on Penny's trail.
Anette Mason is possessed by evil.
Anette taught you the spells of old.
the investigators asked Anette for assistance.
the investigators asked Sanford for assistance.
the investigators assumed control of the Silver Twilight Lodge.
Carl Sanford possesses the secrets of the universe.
the investigators are deceiving the Lodge.
the investigators discovered how to open the puzzle box..
the investigators are enemies of the Lodge.
the guardian of the trap emerged and was defeated.
the guardian of the trap emerged.
the investigators hid their knowledge of the coven.
the investigators were inducted into the Inner Circle.
the investigators escaped the spectral realm.
the investigators kept their mementos hidden.
the investigators learned nothing of the Lodge’s schemes.
the investigators are members of the Lodge.
the investigators are never seen or heard from again.
#X# pieces of evidence were left behind.
the investigators sided with the coven.
the investigators sided with the Lodge.
the investigators signed the Black Book of Azathoth.
the investigators survived the watcher’s embrace.
the investigators told the Lodge about the coven.
the true work of the Silver Twilight Lodge has begun.
во время карнавала многие были принесены в жертву Книдаткуа.
the Excelsior is quiet, for now.
the investigators fled the scene of the crime.

the Day of Reckoning is coming.
the black cat is at your side.
the black cat is at your side.
the black cat delivered news of your plight.
the black cat has a hunch.
the black cat is searching for the truth.
the black cat knows the truth.
the black cat shared knowledge of the Dreamlands.
the black cat spoke of Atlach-Nacha.
the black cat spoke of Nyarlathotep.
the black cat warned the others.
#name# has broken the law of Ulthar.
the investigators were carried to the Cold Wastes.
the cats collected their tribute from the Zoogs.
the dreamers escaped from Nyarlathotep's grasp.
the dreamers know of another path.
the dreamers stayed in the Dreamlands forever.
the dreamers traveled beneath the monasteryr.
the investigators forced their way into the temple.
the investigators parleyed with the Zoogs.
the investigators possess the Silver Key.
Randolph Carter did not survive the voyage.
the investigators were saved by Randolph Carter.
the dreamers strayed from the path.
okay, fine, have it your way then.
the investigators traveled to the Cold Wastes.
